results.code:
69 
70     def detect_ipmi_vendor(
71         self, ipmi_ip: str, username: str = "ADMIN", password: str = "ADMIN"
72     ) -> IPMIVendor:
73         """
74         Detect IPMI vendor based on system responses
75 
76         Args:
77             ipmi_ip: IPMI IP address
78             username: IPMI username
79             password: IPMI password
80 
81         Returns:
82             Detected IPMI vendor
83         ."""
84         try:
85             # Try to get MC info to detect vendor
86             cmd = [
87                 "ipmitool",
88                 "-I",
89                 "lanplus",
90                 "-H",
91                 ipmi_ip,
92                 "-U",
93                 username,
94                 "-P",
95                 password,
96                 "mc",
97                 "info",
98             ]
99             result = subprocess.run(cmd, capture_output=True, text=True, timeout=10)
100 
101             if result.returncode == 0:
102                 output = result.stdout.lower()
103                 if "supermicro" in output:
104                     return IPMIVendor.SUPERMICRO
105                 elif "hewlett" in output or "hp" in output or "ilo" in output:
106                     return IPMIVendor.HP_ILO
107                 elif "dell" in output:
108                     return IPMIVendor.DELL_IDRAC
109 
110             # Try manufacturer-specific commands
111             # Try Supermicro-specific command
112             cmd = [
113                 "ipmitool",
114                 "-I",
115                 "lanplus",
116                 "-H",
117                 ipmi_ip,
118                 "-U",
119                 username,
120                 "-P",
121                 password,
122                 "raw",
123                 "0x30",
124                 "0x21",
125             ]
126             result = subprocess.run(cmd, capture_output=True, text=True, timeout=5)
127             if result.returncode == 0:
128                 return IPMIVendor.SUPERMICRO
129 
130         except Exception as e:
131             logger.warning(f"Error detecting IPMI vendor for {ipmi_ip}: {e}")
132 
133         return IPMIVendor.UNKNOWN
134
results.issue_text: Possible hardcoded password: 'ADMIN'
